mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT CR.COURSE_ID, CR.COURSE_REVIEW_ID, CR.REVIEW_CONTENT, CR.USER_ID, CR.COURSE_SCORE, RI.IMAGE_PATH FROM TBL_COURSE_REVIEW CR LEFT OUTER JOIN TBL_REVIEW_IMG RI ON CR.COURSE_REVIEW_ID = RI.COURSE_REVIEW_ID) R LEFT OUTER JOIN TBL_USER U ON R.USER_ID = U.USER_ID WHERE R.COURSE_ID = #{courseId}
SELECT * FROM (SELECT COURSE_ID, COURSE_TITLE, COURSE_IMG_PATH FROM TBL_COURSE C WHERE COURSE_ID != #{courseId} ORDER BY DBMS_RANDOM.RANDOM) WHERE ROWNUM < 7

SELECT C2.COURSE_ID, C2.COURSE_LEVEL_DIFFICULTY, C2.COURSE_TITLE, C2.COURSE_PRICE, C2.COURSE_DISCOUNT, C2.COURSE_IMG_PATH FROM (SELECT ROWNUM R, C1.COURSE_ID, C1.COURSE_LEVEL_DIFFICULTY, C1.COURSE_TITLE, C1.COURSE_PRICE, C1.COURSE_DISCOUNT, C1.COURSE_IMG_PATH FROM (SELECT COURSE_ID, COURSE_LEVEL_DIFFICULTY, COURSE_TITLE, COURSE_PRICE, COURSE_DISCOUNT, COURSE_IMG_PATH FROM TBL_COURSE ORDER BY COURSE_ID DESC) C1
WHERE ROWNUM <= #{endRow}) C2 WHERE C2.R >= #{startRow}
